\[ \text{Timothy's pens} = 3 \times \text{George's pens} \]
\[ \text{Timothy's pens} = 3 \times 9,330,879 \]
\[ \text{Timothy's pens} = 27,992,637 \]

\[ \text{Sarah's pens} = \frac{1}{2} \times \text{Timothy's pens} \]
\[ \text{Sarah's pens} = \frac{1}{2} \times 27,992,637 \]
\[ \text{Sarah's pens} = 13,996,318.5 \]
